_comment: defaultScope: runtime or artifact (runtime keeps legacy behavior).
runtimeInclude: globs forced into runtime budgets.
runtimeExclude: globs treated as artifacts (excluded from runtime budgets).
artifactExclude: globs removed from artifact classification.
catalogMarkers: substrings searched in first markerScanBytes bytes (e.g. /* @render-catalog */ or // @render-catalog).
artifactViolations.reportNewViolations: set true to include artifacts in baseline/new-violation gating.
